mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(username, mobile, pwd, code, `desc`, demand, address, design_id,cus_reserve1,cus_reserve2) VALUES (#{customer.username},#{customer.mobile},#{customer.pwd},#{customer.code},#{customer.desc},#{customer.demand},#{customer.address},#{designId},#{customer.cusReserve1},#{customer.cusReserve2})
mapper.select: select customer.*, user.id as uid,user.username as name, house.house_id,house.house_name,house.house_address, solutions.solu_id,solutions.solu_name,solutions.state,solutions.solu_desc,solutions.add_time,solutions.share_sign, room.room_id,room.room_name,room.room_desc from t_customer customer left join t_user user on customer.design_id=user.id left join t_house house on house.customer_id=customer.id left join t_solutions solutions on house.house_id = solutions.house_id left join t_room room on solutions.solu_id = room.solu_id where customer.id=#{id}
